name: Project Bunker
description:
Metroidvania gamejam month XIX submission

-

You are subject V, your only purpose here is to give away your flesh for experimental tests inside a bunker. Something went wrong and now is your chance to escape.

Controls:

W,A,S,D  -  Movement

Mouse Right Click (Hold)  - Look at, Aim

Mouse Left Click  -  Shoot

E  - Interact

Tab  -  Inventory

Escape  -  Pause menu

-

We reserve the rights to update this game during the extra 72h of the game jam.

This game is a prototype of an idea we want to explore and expand. We will be updating this game after the game jam is over to develop the full game we have in mind.

Made with Godot 4.0 by: 

@rbarongr https://rbgr.itch.io/
@_Pollet_ https://pollet115.itch.io/
